00042 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00043 /** @defgroup USBDevice_Private_Constant USB Device private constants
00044   * @{
00045   */
00046 #define TCR_MASK                    (0x1FF)
00047 #define EPLEN_MASK                  ((u32)0x000FFC00)
00048 #define EPBUFA_MASK                 ((u32)0x000003FF)
00049 #define ISR_EPn_OFFSET              (8)
00050 
00051 /* USB Control and Status Register (USBCSR)                                                                 */
00052 #define FRES                        ((u32)0x00000002)   /* Force USB Reset                                  */
00053 #define PDWN                        ((u32)0x00000004)   /* Power Down                                       */
00054 #define LPMODE                      ((u32)0x00000008)   /* Low-power Mode                                   */
00055 #define GENRSM                      ((u32)0x00000020)   /* Generate Resume                                  */
00056 #define ADRSET                      ((u32)0x00000100)   /* Device Address Setting                           */
00057 #define SRAMRSTC                    ((u32)0x00000200)   /* USB SRAM reset condition                         */
00058 #define DPPUEN                      ((u32)0x00000400)   /* DP Pull Up Enable                                */
00059 #define DPWKEN                      ((u32)0x00000800)   /* DP Wake Up Enable                                */
00060 
00061 #define EPDIR_IN                    (1)
00062 #define EPDIR_OUT                   (0)
00063 /**
00064   * @}
00065   */
00066 
00067 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00068 /** @defgroup USBDevice_Private_Variable USB Device private variables
00069   * @{
00070   */
00071 static u32 gIsFirstPowered = TRUE;
00072 /**
00073   * @}
00074   */
00075 
00076 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00077 /** @defgroup USBDevice_Private_Macro USB Device private macros
00078   * @{
00079   */
00080 #ifndef USBDCore_LowPower
00081   #define USBDCore_LowPower()      PWRCU_DeepSleep1(PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_WFE)
00082 #endif
00083 /**
00084  * @brief Convert Byte length to Word length
00085  */
00086 #define ByteLen2WordLen(n)      ((n + 3) >> 2)
00087 /**
00088   * @}
00089   */
00090 
00091 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00092 static void _USBD_CopyMemory(u32 *pFrom, u32 *pTo, u32 len);
00093 static HT_USBEP_TypeDef * _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn);
00094 static void _delay(u32 nCount);

00098   * @{
00099   */
00100 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00101   * @brief  Pre initialization for USBD_Init function.
00102   * @param  pDriver: USB initialization structure
00103   * @retval None
00104   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00105 void USBD_PreInit(USBD_Driver_TypeDef *pDriver)
00106 {
00107   pDriver->uInterruptMask = _UIER_ALL;
00108 
00109   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT0].CFGR.word = _EP0_CFG;
00110   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT0].IER       = _EP0_IER;
00111 
00112   #if (_EP1_ENABLE == 1)
00113   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT1].CFGR.word = _EP1_CFG;
00114   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT1].IER       = _EP1_IER;
00115   #endif
00116 
00117   #if (_EP2_ENABLE == 1)
00118   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT2].CFGR.word = _EP2_CFG;
00119   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT2].IER       = _EP2_IER;
00120   #endif
00121 
00122   #if (_EP3_ENABLE == 1)
00123   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT3].CFGR.word = _EP3_CFG;
00124   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT3].IER       = _EP3_IER;
00125   #endif
00126 
00127   #if (_EP4_ENABLE == 1)
00128   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT4].CFGR.word = _EP4_CFG;
00129   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT4].IER       = _EP4_IER;
00130   #endif
00131 
00132   #if (_EP5_ENABLE == 1)
00133   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT5].CFGR.word = _EP5_CFG;
00134   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT5].IER       = _EP5_IER;
00135   #endif
00136 
00137   #if (_EP6_ENABLE == 1)
00138   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT6].CFGR.word = _EP6_CFG;
00139   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT6].IER       = _EP6_IER;
00140   #endif
00141 
00142   #if (_EP7_ENABLE == 1)
00143   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT7].CFGR.word = _EP7_CFG;
00144   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT7].IER       = _EP7_IER;
00145   #endif
00146 
00147   #if (LIBCFG_USBD_V2)
00148   #if (_EP8_ENABLE == 1)
00149   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT8].CFGR.word = _EP8_CFG;
00150   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT8].IER       = _EP8_IER;
00151   #endif
00152 
00153   #if (_EP9_ENABLE == 1)
00154   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT9].CFGR.word = _EP9_CFG;
00155   pDriver->ept[USBD_EPT9].IER       = _EP9_IER;
00156   #endif
00157   #endif
00158   return;
00159 }
00160 
00161 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00162   * @brief  USB Device Peripheral initialization.
00163   * @param  pDriver: USB initialization structure
00164   * @retval None
00165   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00166 void USBD_Init(u32 *pDriver)
00167 {
00168   USBD_Driver_TypeDef *pDrv = (USBD_Driver_TypeDef *)pDriver;
00169 
00170   /* Init USB Device Driver struct                                                                          */
00171   USBD_PreInit(pDrv);
00172 
00173   return;
00174 }
00175 
00176 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00177   * @brief  USB Device Internal DP pull up.
00178   * @param  NewState: ENABLE or DISABLE
00179   * @retval None
00180   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00181 void USBD_DPpullupCmd(ControlStatus NewState)
00182 {
00183   (NewState == ENABLE)?(HT_USB->CSR |= DPPUEN):(HT_USB->CSR &= ~DPPUEN);
00184 }
00185 
00186 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00187   * @brief  USB Device Wake Up when DP is high level.
00188   * @param  NewState: ENABLE or DISABLE
00189   * @retval None
00190   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00191 void USBD_DPWakeUpCmd(ControlStatus NewState)
00192 {
00193   (NewState == ENABLE)?(HT_USB->CSR |= DPWKEN):(HT_USB->CSR &= ~DPWKEN);
00194 }
00195 
00196 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00197   * @brief  USB Device Peripheral deinitialization.
00198   * @retval None
00199   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00200 void USBD_DeInit(void)
00201 {
00202   RSTCU_PeripReset_TypeDef RSTCUReset = {{0}};
00203 
00204   RSTCUReset.Bit.USBD = 1;
00205   RSTCU_PeripReset(RSTCUReset, ENABLE);
00206 
00207   return;
00208 }
00209 
00210 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00211   * @brief  USB power up procedure.
00212   * @retval None
00213   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00214 void USBD_PowerUp(u32 *pDriver, u32 uIsSelfPowered)
00215 {
00216   USBD_Driver_TypeDef *pDrv = (USBD_Driver_TypeDef *)pDriver;
00217 
00218   if (gIsFirstPowered == TRUE)
00219   {
00220     gIsFirstPowered = FALSE;
00221 
00222     if (HT_USB->CSR & 0x40)
00223     {
00224       HT_USB->CSR = (DPPUEN | LPMODE | PDWN);
00225       while((HT_USB->ISR & URSTIE) == 0);
00226       HT_USB->ISR = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00227       if (uIsSelfPowered == FALSE)
00228       {
00229         USBDCore_LowPower();
00230       }
00231       USBD_EnableINT(pDrv->uInterruptMask);
00232     }
00233     else
00234     {
00235       HT_USB->CSR = (DPWKEN | DPPUEN | LPMODE | PDWN);
00236       while((HT_USB->ISR & URSTIE) == 0);
00237       HT_USB->ISR = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00238       if (uIsSelfPowered == FALSE)
00239       {
00240         USBDCore_LowPower();
00241       }
00242       USBD_DPWakeUpCmd(DISABLE);
00243       USBD_EnableINT(pDrv->uInterruptMask);
00244       USBD_DPpullupCmd(DISABLE);
00245       _delay(200);
00246       USBD_DPpullupCmd(ENABLE);
00247     }
00248   }
00249 
00250   return;
00251 }
00252 
00253 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00254   * @brief  Enter USB Device Power Down mode.
00255   * @retval None
00256   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00257 void USBD_PowerOff(void)
00258 {
00259   HT_USB->CSR |= (LPMODE | PDWN);
00260   return;
00261 }
00262 
00263 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00264   * @brief  Exit USB Device Power Down mode.
00265   * @retval None
00266   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00267 void USBD_PowerOn(void)
00268 {
00269   HT_USB->CSR |= 0x00001000;
00270   HT_USB->CSR &= 0x00001400;
00271   return;
00272 }
00273 
00274 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00275   * @brief  USB SRAM reset condition.
00276   * @param  NewState: ENABLE or DISABLE
00277   * @retval None
00278   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00279 void USBD_SRAMResetConditionCmd(ControlStatus NewState)
00280 {
00281   (NewState == ENABLE)?(HT_USB->CSR |= SRAMRSTC):(HT_USB->CSR &= ~SRAMRSTC);
00282 }
00283 
00284 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00285   * @brief  Disable Default pull resistance of D+ and D-.
00286   * @retval None
00287   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00288 void USBD_DisableDefaultPull(void)
00289 {
00290   HT_USB->CSR = FRES; // Clear PDWN and keep FRES = 1
00291 }
00292 
00293 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00294   * @brief  Generate a resume request to USB Host for Remote Wakeup function.
00295   * @retval None
00296   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00297 void USBD_RemoteWakeup(void)
00298 {
00299   HT_USB->CSR |= GENRSM;
00300   return;
00301 }
00302 
00303 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00304   * @brief  Read Endpoint0 SETUP data from USB Buffer.
00305   * @param  pBuffer: Buffer for save SETUP data
00306   * @retval None
00307   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00308 void USBD_ReadSETUPData(u32 *pBuffer)
00309 {
00310   u32 *pSrc = (u32 *)HT_USB_SRAM_BASE;
00311 
00312   *pBuffer = *pSrc;
00313   *(pBuffer + 1) = *(pSrc + 1);
00314   return;
00315 }
00316 
00317 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00318   * @brief  Set USB Device address.
00319   * @param  address: USB address which specified by Host
00320   * @retval None
00321   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00322 void USBD_SetAddress(u32 address)
00323 {
00324   HT_USB->CSR   |= ADRSET;
00325   HT_USB->DEVAR = address;
00326   return;
00327 }
00328 
00329 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00330   * @brief  Enable USB Device interrupt.
00331   * @param  INTFlag: USB Device global interrupt flag
00332   *         @arg UGIE  | SOFIE  | URSTIE | RSMIE  | SUSPIE | ESOFIE
00333   *              EP0IE | EP1IE  | EP2IE  | EP3IE  | EP4IE  | EP5IE  | EP6IE  | EP7IE  | EP8IE  | EP9IE
00334   * @retval None
00335   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00336 void USBD_EnableINT(u32 INTFlag)
00337 {
00338   HT_USB->IER |= INTFlag;
00339   return;
00340 }
00341 
00342 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00343   * @brief  Disable USB Device interrupt.
00344   * @param  INTFlag: USB Device global interrupt flag
00345   *         @arg UGIE  | SOFIE  | URSTIE | RSMIE  | SUSPIE | ESOFIE
00346   *              EP0IE | EP1IE  | EP2IE  | EP3IE  | EP4IE  | EP5IE  | EP6IE  | EP7IE  | EP8IE  | EP9IE
00347   * @retval None
00348   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00349 void USBD_DisableINT(u32 INTFlag)
00350 {
00351   HT_USB->IER &= (~INTFlag);
00352   return;
00353 }
00354 
00355 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00356   * @brief  Get active USB Device interrupt flag.
00357   * @retval USB ISR Flag
00358   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00359 u32 USBD_GetINT(void)
00360 {
00361   u32 IER = HT_USB->IER | FRESIE;
00362   return (HT_USB->ISR & IER);
00363 }
00364 
00365 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00366   * @brief  Clear USB Device interrupt flag.
00367   * @param  INTFlag: USB Device global interrupt flag
00368   *         @arg SOFIF | URSTIF | RSMIF | SUSPIF | ESOFIF
00369   *              EP0IF | EP1IF  | EP2IF | EP3IF  | EP4IF | EP5IF | EP6IF | EP7IF | EP8IF | EP9IF
00370   * @retval None
00371   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00372 void USBD_ClearINT(u32 INTFlag)
00373 {
00374   HT_USB->ISR = INTFlag;
00375   return;
00376 }
00377 
00378 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00379   * @brief  Get USB Endpoint number by interrupt flag.
00380   * @param  INTFlag: USB Device global interrupt flag
00381   *         @arg SOFIF | URSTIF | RSMIF | SUSPIF | ESOFIF
00382   *              EP0IF | EP1IF  | EP2IF | EP3IF  | EP4IF | EP5IF | EP6IF | EP7IF | EP8IF | EP9IF
00383   * @retval USB Endpoint number from USBD_EPT1 ~ USBD_EPT9
00384   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00385 USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_GetEPTnINTNumber(u32 INTFlag)
00386 {
00387   s32 i;
00388   for (i = MAX_EP_NUM - 1; i > 0; i--)
00389   {
00390     if ((INTFlag >> (i + ISR_EPn_OFFSET)) & SET)
00391     {
00392       return (USBD_EPTn_Enum)i;
00393     }
00394   }
00395 
00396   return USBD_NOEPT;
00397 }
00398 
00399 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00400   * @brief  USB Device Peripheral initialization for Endpoint.
00401   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00402   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00403   * @param  pDriver: USB initialization structure
00404   * @retval None
00405   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00406 void USBD_EPTInit(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn, u32 *pDriver)
00407 {
00408   USBD_Driver_TypeDef *pDrv = (USBD_Driver_TypeDef *)pDriver;
00409   HT_USBEP_TypeDef *USBEPn = _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn);
00410 
00411   USBEPn->CFGR = pDrv->ept[USBD_EPTn].CFGR.word;
00412   USBEPn->IER  = pDrv->ept[USBD_EPTn].IER;
00413 
00414   USBEPn->ISR = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00415 
00416   USBD_EPTReset(USBD_EPTn);
00417 
00418   return;
00419 }
00420 
00421 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00422   * @brief  Reset Endpoint Status.
00423   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00424   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00425   * @retval None
00426   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00427 void USBD_EPTReset(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn)
00428 {
00429   HT_USBEP_TypeDef *USBEPn = _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn);
00430   USBEPn->CSR = (USBEPn->CSR) & (DTGTX | DTGRX | NAKRX);
00431   return;
00432 }
00433 
00434 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00435   * @brief  Enable Interrupt for Endpoint.
00436   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00437   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00438   * @param  INTFlag: Interrupt flag
00439   *         @arg OTRXIE | ODRXIE | ODOVIE | ITRXIE | IDTXIE | NAKIE | STLIE | UERIE |
00440   *              STRXIE | SDRXIE | SDERIE | ZLRXIE
00441   * @retval None
00442   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00443 void USBD_EPTEnableINT(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn, u32 INTFlag)
00444 {
00445   _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn)->IER = INTFlag;
00446   return;
00447 }
00448 
00449 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00450   * @brief  Get active USB Device Endpoint interrupt.
00451   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00452   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00453   * @retval USB Endpoint ISR Flag
00454   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00455 u32 USBD_EPTGetINT(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn)
00456 {
00457   HT_USBEP_TypeDef *USBEPn = _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn);
00458   u32 IER = USBEPn->IER;
00459   return (USBEPn->ISR & IER);
00460 }
00461 
00462 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00463   * @brief  Clear Interrupt for Endpoint.
00464   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00465   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00466   * @param  INTFlag: Interrupt flag
00467   *         @arg OTRXIF | ODRXIF | ODOVIF | ITRXIF | IDTXIF | NAKIF | STLIF | UERIF |
00468   *              STRXIF | SDRXIF | SDERIF | ZLRXIF
00469   * @retval None
00470   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00471 void USBD_EPTClearINT(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn, u32 INTFlag)
00472 {
00473   _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn)->ISR = INTFlag;
00474   return;
00475 }
00476 
00477 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00478   * @brief  Get Endpoint n Halt status (STLTX or STLRX).
00479   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00480   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00481   * @retval Endpoint Halt Status (1: Endpoint is Halt, 0: Endpoint is not Halt)
00482   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00483 u32 USBD_EPTGetHalt(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn)
00484 {
00485   HT_USBEP_TypeDef *USBEPn = _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn);
00486   USBD_EPTCFGR_Bit *CFGR = (USBD_EPTCFGR_Bit *)(&(USBEPn->CFGR));
00487   if (CFGR->EPDIR == EPDIR_IN)
00488   {
00489     return (((USBEPn->CSR) & STLTX) ? 1 : 0);
00490   }
00491   else
00492   {
00493     return (((USBEPn->CSR) & STLRX) ? 1 : 0);
00494   }
00495 }
00496 
00497 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00498   * @brief  Send STALL on Endpoint n.
00499   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00500   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00501   * @retval None
00502   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00503 void USBD_EPTSendSTALL(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn)
00504 {
00505   _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn)->CSR = STLTX;
00506   return;
00507 }
00508 
00509 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00510   * @brief  Set Endpoint n Halt status (STLTX or STLRX).
00511   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00512   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00513   * @retval None
00514   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00515 void USBD_EPTSetHalt(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn)
00516 {
00517   HT_USBEP_TypeDef *USBEPn = _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn);
00518 
00519 #if 1
00520   /* Clean STLIF flag, for USBD_EPTWaitSTALLSent function                                                   */
00521   USBEPn->ISR = STLIF;
00522   USBEPn->CSR = (~(USBEPn->CSR)) & (STLTX | STLRX);
00523 #else
00524   USBD_EPTCFGR_Bit *CFGR = (USBD_EPTCFGR_Bit *)(&(USBEPn->CFGR));
00525   if (CFGR->EPDIR == EPDIR_IN)
00526   {
00527     /* Clean STLIF flag, for USBD_EPTWaitSTALLSent function                                                 */
00528     USBEPn->ISR = STLIF;
00529     /* Set only when STLTX = 0                                                                              */
00530     USBEPn->CSR = (~(USBEPn->CSR)) & STLTX;
00531   }
00532   else
00533   {
00534     /* Set only when STLRX = 0                                                                              */
00535     USBEPn->CSR = (~(USBEPn->CSR)) & STLRX;
00536   }
00537 #endif
00538 
00539   return;
00540 }
00541 
00542 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00543   * @brief  Clear Endpoint n Halt status (STLTX or STLRX).
00544   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00545   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00546   * @retval None
00547   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00548 void USBD_EPTClearHalt(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn)
00549 {
00550   HT_USBEP_TypeDef *USBEPn = _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn);
00551 
00552 #if 1
00553   USBEPn->CSR = (USBEPn->CSR) & (STLTX | STLRX);
00554 #else
00555   USBD_EPTCFGR_Bit *CFGR = (USBD_EPTCFGR_Bit *)(&(USBEPn->CFGR));
00556   if (CFGR->EPDIR == EPDIR_IN)
00557   {
00558     /* Clear only when STLTX = 1                                                                            */
00559     USBEPn->CSR = (USBEPn->CSR) & STLTX;
00560   }
00561   else
00562   {
00563     /* Clear only when STLRX = 1                                                                            */
00564     USBEPn->CSR = (USBEPn->CSR) & STLRX;
00565   }
00566 #endif
00567 
00568   return;
00569 }
00570 
00571 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00572   * @brief  Wait until STALL transmission is finished
00573   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00574   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00575   * @retval None
00576   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00577 void USBD_EPTWaitSTALLSent(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn)
00578 {
00579   HT_USBEP_TypeDef *USBEPn = _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn);
00580   USBD_EPTCFGR_Bit *CFGR = (USBD_EPTCFGR_Bit *)(&(USBEPn->CFGR));
00581   u32 uSTALLState = (CFGR->EPDIR == EPDIR_IN) ? ((USBEPn->CSR) & STLTX) : ((USBEPn->CSR) & STLRX);
00582 
00583   if (uSTALLState)
00584   {
00585     while ((USBEPn->ISR & STLIF) == 0);
00586   }
00587 
00588   return;
00589 }
00590 
00591 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00592   * @brief  Clear Endpoint n Data toggle bit (DTGTX or DTGRX).
00593   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00594   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00595   * @retval None
00596   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00597 void USBD_EPTClearDTG(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn)
00598 {
00599   HT_USBEP_TypeDef *USBEPn = _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn);
00600 
00601 #if 1
00602   USBEPn->CSR = (USBEPn->CSR) & (DTGTX | DTGRX);
00603 #else
00604   USBD_EPTCFGR_Bit *CFGR = (USBD_EPTCFGR_Bit *)(&(USBEPn->CFGR));
00605   if (CFGR->EPDIR == EPDIR_IN)
00606   {
00607     /* Clear only when DTGTX = 1                                                                            */
00608     USBEPn->CSR = (USBEPn->CSR) & DTGTX;
00609   }
00610   else
00611   {
00612     /* Clear only when DTGRX = 1                                                                            */
00613     USBEPn->CSR = (USBEPn->CSR) & DTGRX;
00614   }
00615 #endif
00616   return;
00617 }
00618 
00619 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00620   * @brief  Get Endpoint n buffer 0 address.
00621   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00622   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00623   * @retval USB Endpoint buffer 0 address
00624   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00625 u32 USBD_EPTGetBuffer0Addr(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn)
00626 {
00627   HT_USBEP_TypeDef *USBEPn = _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn);
00628   return (HT_USB_SRAM_BASE + (USBEPn->CFGR & EPBUFA_MASK));
00629 }
00630 
00631 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00632   * @brief  Get Endpoint n buffer 1 address.
00633   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00634   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00635   * @retval USB Endpoint buffer 1 address
00636   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00637 u32 USBD_EPTGetBuffer1Addr(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn)
00638 {
00639   HT_USBEP_TypeDef *USBEPn = _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn);
00640   return (HT_USB_SRAM_BASE + (USBEPn->CFGR & EPBUFA_MASK) + USBD_EPTGetBufferLen(USBD_EPTn));
00641 }
00642 
00643 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00644   * @brief  Get Endpoint n buffer length.
00645   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00646   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00647   * @retval USB Endpoint buffer length
00648   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00649 u32 USBD_EPTGetBufferLen(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn)
00650 {
00651   return ((_USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn)->CFGR & EPLEN_MASK) >> 10);
00652 }
00653 
00654 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00655   * @brief  Get Endpoint n Transfer Count.
00656   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00657   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00658   * @param  USBD_TCR_n: USBD_TCR_0 or USBD_TCR_1
00659   * @retval Endpoint Transfer Count
00660   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00661 u32 USBD_EPTGetTransferCount(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn, USBD_TCR_Enum USBD_TCR_n)
00662 {
00663   return (((_USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn)->TCR) >> USBD_TCR_n) & TCR_MASK);
00664 }
00665 
00666 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00667   * @brief  Write IN Data from User buffer to USB buffer.
00668   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00669   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00670   * @param  pFrom: Source buffer
00671   * @param  len: Length for write IN data
00672   * @retval Total length written by this function
00673   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00674 u32 USBD_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn, u32 *pFrom, u32 len)
00675 {
00676   u32 bufferlen = USBD_EPTGetBufferLen(USBD_EPTn);
00677   HT_USBEP_TypeDef *USBEPn = _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn);
00678   u32 EPTnLen;
00679   u32 *pTo;
00680 
00681   EPTnLen = (USBD_EPTn == USBD_EPT0) ? USBD_EPTGetTransferCount(USBD_EPTn, USBD_CNTIN):USBD_EPTGetTransferCount(USBD_EPTn, USBD_CNTB0);
00682 
00683   if (len <= bufferlen && EPTnLen == 0)
00684   {
00685     pTo = (u32 *)USBD_EPTGetBuffer0Addr(USBD_EPTn);
00686     _USBD_CopyMemory(pFrom, pTo, ByteLen2WordLen(len));
00687     USBEPn->TCR = len;
00688     USBEPn->CSR = NAKTX;
00689     return len;
00690   }
00691   else
00692   {
00693     return 0;
00694   }
00695 }
00696 
00697 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00698   * @brief  Read OUT Data from USB buffer to User buffer.
00699   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00700   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00701   * @param  pTo: Destination memory
00702   * @param  len: Length for read OUT data, set as 0 for discard current OUT data in the USB buffer
00703   * @retval Total length read by this function
00704   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00705 u32 USBD_EPTReadOUTData(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn, u32 *pTo, u32 len)
00706 {
00707   HT_USBEP_TypeDef *USBEPn = _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn);
00708   u32 EPTnLen = 0;
00709 
00710   if (len != 0)
00711   {
00712     EPTnLen = USBD_EPTReadMemory(USBD_EPTn, pTo, len);
00713   }
00714 
00715   if (EPTnLen != 0 || len == 0)
00716   {
00717     USBEPn->CSR = (USBEPn->CSR & NAKRX);
00718   }
00719 
00720   return EPTnLen;
00721 }
00722 
00723 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00724   * @brief  Read memory from endpoint buffer.
00725   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00726   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00727   * @param  pTo: Destination buffer
00728   * @param  len: Length for read OUT data
00729   * @retval Total length read by this function
00730   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00731 u32 USBD_EPTReadMemory(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn, u32 *pTo, u32 len)
00732 {
00733   u32 EPTnLen = 0;
00734   u32 *pFrom;
00735 
00736   EPTnLen = (USBD_EPTn == USBD_EPT0) ? USBD_EPTGetTransferCount(USBD_EPTn, USBD_CNTOUT):USBD_EPTGetTransferCount(USBD_EPTn, USBD_CNTB0);
00737 
00738   if (EPTnLen <= len)
00739   {
00740     pFrom = (USBD_EPTn == USBD_EPT0) ? (u32 *)USBD_EPTGetBuffer1Addr(USBD_EPTn):(u32 *)USBD_EPTGetBuffer0Addr(USBD_EPTn);
00741     _USBD_CopyMemory(pFrom, pTo, ByteLen2WordLen(EPTnLen));
00742   }
00743 
00744   return EPTnLen;
00745 }
00746 /**
00747   * @}
00748   */
00749 
00750 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00751 /** @defgroup USBDevice_Private_Function USB Device private functions
00752   * @{
00753   */
00754 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00755   * @brief  Copy 32 bits memory from pFrom to pTo.
00756   * @param  pFrom: Source buffer
00757   * @param  pTo: Destination buffer
00758   * @param  len: Copy length
00759   * @retval None
00760   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00761 static void _USBD_CopyMemory(u32 *pFrom, u32 *pTo, u32 len)
00762 {
00763   s32 i;
00764   u32 uFromAligned = (((u32)pFrom & 0x3) == 0) ? 1 : 0;
00765   u32 uToAligned = (((u32)pTo & 0x3) == 0) ? 1 : 0;
00766   u8 *pFromByte = (u8 *)pFrom;
00767   u8 *pToByte = (u8 *)pTo;
00768 
00769   if (uFromAligned == 0)
00770   {
00771     if (uToAligned == 0)
00772     {
00773       for (i = len - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00774       {
00775         *pToByte++ = *pFromByte++;
00776         *pToByte++ = *pFromByte++;
00777         *pToByte++ = *pFromByte++;
00778         *pToByte++ = *pFromByte++;
00779       }
00780     }
00781     else
00782     {
00783       u32 uTemp = 0;
00784       for (i = 0; i < (s32)len; i++)
00785       {
00786         uTemp = *(pFromByte++) << 0;
00787         uTemp += *(pFromByte++) << 8;
00788         uTemp += *(pFromByte++) << 16;
00789         uTemp += *(pFromByte++) << 24;
00790         pTo[i] = uTemp;
00791       }
00792     }
00793   }
00794   else
00795   {
00796     if (uToAligned == 0)
00797     {
00798       u32 uTemp = 0;
00799       for (i = 0; i < (s32)len; i++)
00800       {
00801         uTemp = pFrom[i];
00802         *pToByte++ = (uTemp >>  0) & 0xFF;
00803         *pToByte++ = (uTemp >>  8) & 0xFF;
00804         *pToByte++ = (uTemp >> 16) & 0xFF;
00805         *pToByte++ = (uTemp >> 24) & 0xFF;
00806       }
00807     }
00808     else
00809     {
00810       for (i = len - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00811       {
00812         pTo[i] = pFrom[i];
00813       }
00814     }
00815   }
00816 
00817   return;
00818 }
00819 
00820 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00821   * @brief  Convent USBD_EPTn_Enum to USBEP_TypeDef.
00822   * @param  USBD_EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00823   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
00824   * @retval USBEP0 ~ USBEP9
00825   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00826 static HT_USBEP_TypeDef * _USBD_GetEPTnAddr(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn)
00827 {
00828   return ((HT_USBEP_TypeDef *)(HT_USBEP0 + USBD_EPTn));
00829 }
00830 
00831 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00832   * @brief  Inserts a delay time.
00833   * @param  nCount: specifies the delay time length.
00834   * @retval None
00835   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00836 static void _delay(u32 nCount)
00837 {
00838   u32 i;
00839 
00840   for (i = 0; i < nCount; i++)
00841   {
00842   }
00843 }
00844 /**
00845   * @}
00846   */
00847 
00848 
00849 /**
00850   * @}
00851   */
00852 
00853 /**
00854   * @}
00855   */
